The FURbeast works just OK for my cat who has fine silky hair, but it's not so terrific for Joshua who a has thick, heavy coat. Yes, hair is loosened, but a fair amount remains on both cats. I found the FURbeast doesn't grab the loose hair the way that 'other brand' does.
